name: Happy Bubble Rescue Pet
description:
Happy Bubble Rescue Pet!!!
Experience this addictive bubble shooter classic, explore hundreds of amazing bubble hit levels filled with unsolved match puzzles. This amazing bubble pop games features highly addictive gameplay, Once you start, you simply won’t put it down!
Features:
-Classic bubble puzzle games, Brand new gameplay
-300 fun levels of bubble mania, infinite challenge
-Accurate aiming controls, fluent bubble matching
-Shoot ball with power-up balls, get higher score
-Rescue cute pet, little animals are waiting for rescued
-Easy to pick up, train your brain and finger
